sentences.en: A census in 1980 revealed that approximately 6 percent of rural Nigerien men are wage earners.
sentences.cn: 1980年的一次人口调查披露,尼日尔的农村居民中,有将近6%是挣工资者.

sentences.en: A new pet census showed that cats now outnumber dogs by a whisker (7 million to 6.9 million).
sentences.cn: 新的宠物普查显示出猫的数量略微超过了狗的数量（700万比690万）。

sentences.en: According to the latest census, our population has increased.
sentences.cn: 根据最近调查, 我国的人口有所增加.

sentences.en: All other traffic is allowed to pass the census point without being halted.
sentences.cn: 让其余车辆均通过统计站而不必停车.

sentences.en: Census data determines the distribution of federal funds and electoral district boundaries.
sentences.cn: 人口普查数据决定着联邦资金的分配和选举区的划分.

sentences.en: Every province and autonomous region should treat the census seriously.
sentences.cn: 各省区都要认真做好人口普查工作.

sentences.en: For the 2000 decennial census, that will no longer be the case.
sentences.cn: 10年一次的人口普查又将在2000年举行.

sentences.en: He and Mary journeyed to Bethlehem to be counted in the Roman census, and while they were there the child was born.
sentences.cn: 他和玛利亚一起去到伯利恒，罗马的人口普查把他们统计在内。 他们在那里时，孩子降生了。

sentences.en: Most often , though, census takers are politely received and assisted.
sentences.cn: 但是,在大多数情况下, 人口普查员会受到礼遇,得到协助.

sentences.en: One authority made a census of the spiders in a grass field in the south of England, and he estimated that there were more than 2,250,000 in one acre.
sentences.cn: 一位权威对英国南方一块草坪上的蜘蛛作过统计, 他估计每英亩有2,250,000多只蜘蛛.

sentences.en: Source: Census and Statistics Department , Taiwan and Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 资料来源: 我国海关统计、香港海关统计.

sentences.en: The census enumerated eighty - six persons over one hundred years old in this mountain area.
sentences.cn: 根据人口调查这一带山区共有八十六位百岁老人.

sentences.en: The census is controversial because so much depends on it.
sentences.cn: 人口普查饱受牵连,富有争议.

sentences.en: The census is taken one time every four years in our country.
sentences.cn: 我国每四年一次人口普查。

sentences.en: The detailed assessment of the latest census will be ready in three months.
sentences.cn: 有关最新人口普查的详细评估工作将在3个月内就绪。

sentences.en: They'll have to revise the census returns before I'm done with this place.
sentences.cn: 我在这地方干完了工作,人家就得修改户口调查表啦.
但山姆大叔的人口普查员们却知道.

phrases.tran_cn: 人口统计局，人口调查局；人口普查局

trans.tran_en: an official process of counting a country’s population and finding out about the people
